wikipedia_page.main: Charles Cochran (31 August 1800 – 9 September 1885) was an English first-class cricketer associated with Surrey and Epsom Cricket Club who was active in the 1810s. He is recorded in one match in 1819, totalling 7 runs with a highest score of 6.

response: * Charles Cochran (South Carolina politician) (1766–1833), intendant (mayor) of Charleston, South Carolina
